meanings.definition: Covered with a thin layer of a particular material.
meanings.sent1: The thinclad book had a shiny cover.
meanings.sent2: The car was thinclad with a layer of protective film.
meanings.sent3: The thinclad phone looked like it was wearing a sleek jacket.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was as thinclad as a delicate veil.
meanings.sent5: The thinclad leaves shimmered in the sunlight.

meanings.definition: A person or thing covered with a thin layer of a particular material.
meanings.sent1: The thinclad statue gleamed in the museum.
meanings.sent2: The thinclad dancer wore a costume that sparkled under the lights.
meanings.sent3: The thinclad cupcake was almost too pretty to eat.
meanings.sent4: The thinclad warrior stood out among the heavily armored soldiers.
meanings.sent5: The thinclad ship sailed gracefully across the sea.
